description: The Job Listing Archetype - Essential properties that define a job listing
title: Job Listing Schema

___updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___listing_region.description: The general region where the job listing is located.  Can be a US state, or a province, for instance.

___compensation.description: Compensation in cents as an integer (whole number)

___subcategory.description: Specific category of the job listing, e.g. Biomedical Engineering

___tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record

___created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

___draft.description: Indicates this archetype record is a draft and is not published

____id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

___category.description: General category of the job listing, e.g. Engineering

___company_logo.description: Image Archetype ID to use as the company logo of this job listing
